edu.psu.citeseerx.corecom
Class SocketInitializer

java.lang.Object
  edu.psu.citeseerx.corecom.SocketInitializer
Direct Known Subclasses:
ByteStreamSocketInitializer, XStreamSocketInitializer
public abstract class SocketInitializer
extends java.lang.Object

A container for socket connections that allows an implementation-specific initialization routine whose call can be delayed until an appropriate time. This allows an ObjectServer to thread off an incoming connection without first transforming the client socket into an ObjectTransferConnection, which performs a blocking read upon construction until the first object is transferred.
